name: morning-checkin
command: curl -X POST "https://api.telegram.org/bot${TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN}/sendMessage" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"chat_id": "${TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID}", "text": "Morning. Ready to plan today?\n\n/checkin when ready."}'

name: midday-checkpoint
command: curl -X POST "https://api.telegram.org/bot${TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN}/sendMessage" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"chat_id": "${TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID}", "text": "Midday check. How\'s it going?\n\nOn track? Or need to adjust?"}'

name: end-of-day-handoff
command: curl -X POST "https://api.telegram.org/bot${TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN}/sendMessage" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"chat_id": "${TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID}", "text": "End of day. Time to log wins.\n\n/handoff when ready."}'

name: sync-command-center
job: Read the file at operating_system/SYNC_COMMAND_CENTER.md and complete the tasks described there.

name: heartbeat
job: Read the file at operating_system/HEARTBEAT.md and complete the tasks described there.
